revised_title: The Discovery and Properties of Quarks and Leptons
tldr: This article discusses the current status of quarks and leptons as the fundamental constituents of matter. It explores the history of the discovery of these particles and their properties, as well as the implications of their existence for our understanding of the structure of matter. The article also touches upon the possibility of a deeper layer of reality beyond quarks and leptons and the importance of studying their behavior to uncover Nature's secrets.
